statements: SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, teacher_name FROM teacher_schedule ORDER BY availability_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE course_id = 101 AND availability_hours > 20;
SELECT teacher_name, availability_hours FROM teacher_schedule WHERE availability_hours <= 10 ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_name FROM teacher_schedule;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE availability_hours > 30 ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, course_id FROM teacher_schedule WHERE availability_hours < 20 AND teacher_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT teacher_name, availability_hours FROM teacher_schedule WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY availability_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_name = 'Alice' OR teacher_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY availability_hours ASC, teacher_name ASC;
SELECT teacher_name, course_id, availability_hours FROM teacher_schedule WHERE availability_hours < 40 ORDER BY teacher_name ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_date, start_time FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, assignment_date FROM course_assignment WHERE teacher_id = 3 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, start_time, end_time FROM teacher_schedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT assignment_id, course_id, assignment_date FROM course_assignment WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule ORDER BY teacher_id DESC, schedule_date ASC, start_time DESC
SELECT teacher_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 3
SELECT * FROM course_assignment WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01' AND course_id = 5 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id FROM course_assignment WHERE course_id = 2
SELECT course_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM course_assignment GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY total_assignments DESC
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT teacher_id, course_id FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_id=1;
SELECT end_time, start_time FROM teacher_schedule WHERE course_id=3;
SELECT teacher_id, day_of_week FROM teacher_availability WHERE teacher_id=2 AND available=TRUE;
SELECT course_id, assigned_date FROM course_assignment WHERE assigned_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM course_assignment GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING num_courses > 3 ORDER BY num_courses DESC
SELECT teacher_id, course_id, DAYNAME(assigned_date) AS day_name FROM course_assignment WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY teacher_id, course_id
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id, COUNT(*) AS num_days_available FROM teacher_availability WHERE available = TRUE GROUP BY teacher_id ORDER BY num_days_available DESC

SELECT teacher_id, course_id, TIME_FORMAT(start_time, '%h:%i %p') AS start_time_format, TIME_FORMAT(end_time, '%h:%i %p') AS end_time_format FROM teacher_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday' ORDER BY start_time
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 'abc123';
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_phone FROM teachers WHERE teacher_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_phone FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM teachers WHERE teacher_email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_phone FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week='Monday' AND start_time >= '09:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM course_assignments GROUP BY teacher_name HAVING num_courses > 2;
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule;
SELECT teacher_id, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM teacher_schedule ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;
SELECT course_id, teacher_id, course_name FROM course_assignments WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM teacher_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM teacher_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM teacher_info WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_assignments WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT teacher_id, day_of_week, available FROM teacher_availability WHERE teacher_id = 4 AND available = TRUE;
